description: This refreshing iced earl grey tea recipe has sweet, tropical taste.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pineapple Ice Tea Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan with the water.
Add the teabags and sugar and allow to simmer until the sugar melts.
Remove from the heat and add the chopped pineapple.
Transfer to a large jug and store in the fridge overnight.
Next day, sieve the iced tea from the jug into your serving glass with ice.
